hmh.android.ui.actionbar

Class ActionBarHelperHoneycomb

  • java.lang.Object
    • hmh.android.ui.actionbar.ActionBarHelper
      • hmh.android.ui.actionbar.ActionBarHelperHoneycomb
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActionBarHelperICS

    public class ActionBarHelperHoneycomb
extends ActionBarHelper
    An extension of ActionBarHelper that provides Android 3.0-specific functionality for Honeycomb tablets. It thus requires API level 11.

    • Method Detail

      • onCreateOptionsMenu

        public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu)
        Description copied from class: ActionBarHelper
        Action bar helper code to be run in Activity#onCreateOptionsMenu(android.view.Menu). NOTE: Setting the visibility of menu items in menu is not currently supported.
        Overrides:
        onCreateOptionsMenu in class ActionBarHelper

      • setRefreshActionItemState

        public void setRefreshActionItemState(boolean refreshing)
        Description copied from class: ActionBarHelper
        Sets the indeterminate loading state of the item with ID R.id.menu_refresh. (where the item ID was menu_refresh).
        Specified by:
        setRefreshActionItemState in class ActionBarHelper

      • getActionBarThemedContext

        protected Context getActionBarThemedContext()
        Returns a Context suitable for inflating layouts for the action bar. The implementation for this method in ActionBarHelperICS asks the action bar for a themed context.
